overview: The reality show with a little something extra ... sex! Late night has never been this smoldering, this candid, this real. Cupid's Arrow follows each blind date from nervous beginning to sensual end. It's a reality show with all the raw sex and action you could never get on TV. Sit back and enjoy the show!

title: Cupid's Arrow
